review: The Firestick was amazing, however, it developed a problem. It was like the remote button was sticking, the video would advance like someone was rapidly pushing the pause button on and off. Sometimes the remote would advance thru a menu rapidly, even though you only pressed the button on the remote one time. I don't know if the issue was the remote or the Firestick, but up until this happened, the device worked beautifully!I ordered a replacement!
